title: constant freezing during client b4 games
body: idk whats going on but its only league that freezes b4 a game and i lose lp, i getall the 30 minute wait times and stuff, yet my computer has 1t hard drive, 16g ram, intel i5 wqith 3.4ghz and has 3 fans and is oil cooled, yet only league freezes and i get punished.... like this is BS and its not my fault... its taken almost 9 LP and given me ages of wait times... thats bs

replies.body: If you're freezing up during champion select, then it's likely that your network is unable and kicking you off.  Your rig does sound pretty amazing, but it's probably your connection that's the culprit.  I suggest using the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot and tighten up your network.  Test it out in a custom game, though, to prevent further penalties.  I hope that helps!
